name: Muscle Mouse
description:
Muscle Mouse is a short game about a rat who is very strong and throws things.

This one has controller support!

These games never come out as impressive as I hope, but I think they're getting better.

Sorry the movement is kinda janky in this one- I still haven't figured out wall jumping.

CONTROLS

Interact/Confirm: Z / Square

Cancel: X (Keyboard) / Circle

Jump: X

Menu: C / Start

Move: Arrow Keys / Stick
